alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 5:28AM CDT until April 01 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LOUDON...EAST CENTRAL MCMINN...SOUTHWESTERN BLOUNT AND MONROE COUNTIES... At 627 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madisonville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Madisonville, Englewood, Vonore, Greenback, Tellico Plains, Fort Loudon State Park, Tariffville, McGee Carson Peninsula and Citico Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
